title: Add username and password authentication to admin dashboard

requirements.text: Create a backend authentication system with username and password validation for admin access

quotes: please hide admin dashboard behind username and password

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a method to validate username and password combinations
Backend returns authentication success or failure status

requirements.text: Create an admin login page at /admin/login with username and password input fields

quotes: please hide admin dashboard behind username and password

acceptanceCriteria: Login form displays username and password fields
Form validates that both fields are filled before submission
Form shows error messages for invalid credentials

requirements.text: Protect the /admin route to require authentication before displaying the admin dashboard

quotes: please hide admin dashboard behind username and password

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users accessing /admin are redirected to /admin/login
Authenticated admin users can access the dashboard
Authentication state persists across page refreshes
Admin can log out and return to login page

requirements.text: Remove or hide the admin navigation link from the Header component for non-authenticated admin users

quotes: please hide admin dashboard behind username and password

acceptanceCriteria: Admin link only appears in navigation when admin is authenticated
Regular users do not see admin navigation link
Admin navigation link functions correctly for authenticated admins

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and components/ui directory
Preserve existing Internet Identity authentication for regular users
Keep all existing admin functionality in AdminPage.tsx intact
nonGoals: Multi-user admin system with role-based permissions
